TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi WebItem extends System.Object

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.* classes are obsolete and supported within 32 bit processes only. http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=160862")

summary.span: 使已升级的 Visual Basic 6.0 项目能够在 ASP.NET 中运行。

span.span: Enables upgraded Visual Basic 6.0 projects to run in ASP.NET.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 Visual Basic 6.0`WebClass`项目升级到 Visual Basic，它将转换为[!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)]网站项目。When a Visual Basic 6.0 `WebClass` project is upgraded to Visual Basic, it is converted to an [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] Web site project. 声明添加到你的项目： 一个用于`WebClass`，另一个用于每个`WebItems`和`Templates`中`WebClass`项目。Declarations are added to your project: one for the `WebClass` and one for each of the `WebItems` and `Templates` in the `WebClass` project. A`Page_Load`事件过程添加到项目中，首先创建对象，然后`WebItem`为每个对象`WebItems`和`Templates`与 Visual Basic 6.0`WebClass`项目。A `Page_Load` event procedure is added to the project, creating first a object and then `WebItem` objects for each of the `WebItems` and `Templates` associated with the Visual Basic 6.0 `WebClass` project. 最后，在`Page_Load`事件过程中，你将看到调用`WebClass`兼容性运行时： 。Finally, in the `Page_Load` event procedure, you will see a call to the `WebClass` Compatibility runtime: . 这使运行时能够呈现在请求 URL 中指定。This enables the runtime to render the specified in the Request URL. 此代码是仅新的代码添加到升级后的项目，仅用于模拟的 Visual Basic 6.0 基础行为`WebClass`运行时。This code is the only new code added to your upgraded project and only serves to emulate the underlying behavior of the Visual Basic 6.0 `WebClass` runtime. [!INCLUDE[Note_compatibility](~/includes/note-compatibility-md.md)]

param.span: 一个 ，包含 Visual Basic 6.0 对象的 属性。

span.span: A that contains the property for the Visual Basic 6.0 object.

param.name: HtmlTemplateFilename
param.span: 与 Visual Basic 6.0 关联的 Visual Basic 6.0 的文件名。

span.span: The file name of a Visual Basic 6.0 that was associated with the Visual Basic 6.0 .

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类用于通过使用升级工具升级 Visual Basic 6.0`WebClass`项目合并为[!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)]网站项目。The class is used by the upgrade tools to upgrade a Visual Basic 6.0 `WebClass` project to an [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] Web site project. [!INCLUDE[Note_compatibility](~/includes/note-compatibility-md.md)]
